title: SSC Survey Results 2019
summary:
Key ideas
- The author thanks over 8,000 people for taking the 2019 Slate Star Codex survey, and provides links to the survey questions and results.
- The author plans on publishing more in-depth analyses of the survey responses over the next year.
- The author offers a download link for the answers of the 7,000 people who agreed to public dissemination.

Key learnings
- The author emphasizes the importance of data privacy and restricted access to sensitive information.
- The author stresses the need for large datasets in order to obtain reliable results in surveys.

Key questions
- None specified.
